casebody.data:
UNITED STATES ex rel. Abraham MICHAELS, Relator-Appellant, v. William C. HECHT, as U. S. Marshal, etc., Respondent-Appellee. No. 221. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 2, 1931. Charles.G. F. Wahle, of New York City, for appellant. Robert E. Manley, of New York City (Joseph E. Sharp, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
